attributes.additional_details:
France are raking in the money from us poor British just using our own roads. They are charging £2:50 for one way through the tunnel or just to go over the bridge.
Why should we pay France to use our own tunnel/bridge, when we were promised in 1991 that the payments were only until the bridges debts were paid off? So why are we now paying France.
The Dartford charge should be scraped !
attributes.background: Scrap Dartford charge because the bridges debts are all paid and now all the money is going to France!
